channel.title: Fish Mask?
channel.description: Do you guys think it would be a good investment? I heard that you can only get them from SoF in the summer and after the bot nuke, I have a feeling they're going to skyrocket... Thoughts?

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Team cape

Team capes are wilderness capes that can be purchased for 50 coins from cape merchants. Another player with the same team cape equipped will show up on the minimap as a blue dot rather than white, and the left-click "Attack" option will be moved to a...

Read full topic

@mod_taharok wrote:

I’m pretty sure it prevents monsters under aggression level from automatically attacking you too.

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:29, topic:458082”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=561007.msg4095312#msg4095312 date=1346781099]
I’m not sure if you realised but I said meant, meant in this context doesn’t mean its the only function.
[/quote]

That’s not what a Team Cape is meant for either.[/quote]

Team capes (also known as Wilderness capes) are purchased for 50 coins from various Wilderness cape dealers. Another player with the same team cape equipped will show up on the minimap as a blue dot rather than white, and the left-click "Attack" option will be moved to a right-click, as if the other player is of higher level than the player. They are very common among F2P players. If two players are wearing different team capes, then the "Attack" option for each other will both be left-click, regardless if one player has a higher combat level.
It clearly indicates what I said.. Then elaborate, what is it [b]meant[/b] for oh wise one.

Read full topic

Kidpaparoach:

I’m not sure if you realised but I said meant, meant in this context doesn’t mean its the only function.

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:26, topic:458082”]Same affect as a team cape? An afro is an afro, a hair cosmetic item… A team cape is meant to show who’s in which team…
Afros were buyable for 40gp(?) Each… Fish masks are winnable in the sof.

They will rise over time but nowhere near as much as current rares as nobody really thought they would rise etc and only kept it cause of the looks, not value.
They may rise over time to a nice price because people think they’ll become as valuable as current rares but they won’t.
Current rares are more rare, look aethetically nicer and are worth much more.
You never know though, they could crash to a low price when people realise they aren’t on par with current rares.[/quote]

Not the only function of a Team Cape.

Read full topic

@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Same affect as a team cape? An afro is an afro, a hair cosmetic item… A team cape is meant to show who’s in which team…
Afros were buyable for 40gp(?) Each… Fish masks are winnable in the sof.

They will rise over time but nowhere near as much as current rares as nobody really thought they would rise etc and only kept it cause of the looks, not value.
They may rise over time to a nice price because people think they’ll become as valuable as current rares but they won’t.
Current rares are more rare, look aethetically nicer and are worth much more.
You never know though, they could crash to a low price when people realise they aren’t on par with current rares.

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

The Wanderer:

Depends how long you are willing to wait. It took 6 years for santas to reach 110m and they actually look nice.

This, Fish Masks make you look like a Pedo. No one wants to try to Online Date with that on. You get all the Rs Ladies with a Santa or Phat <3

But Then again. There is the Pumpkin, and that looks shitty. But its crashing as we speak… So ya Fish Masks will someday be 300m. If Rs is up that long.

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?

item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I don’t know how much this will contribute, but I’m sure alot of people plan on quitting after the combat rework goes live, so if they don’t give the masks away or anything the value will probably go up.

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Wing Dark Wing
item.description:
@Dark_Wing wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:22, topic:458082”][quote author=Dark Wing link=topic=561007.msg4094618#msg4094618 date=1346713340]
Fish masks are so ugly to me, but I’m planning to invest so that’s why I have some I hope they rise but it will take a while. It’s going to rise/drop in the mean time. I hope they get to 8M. I sold one for about 3.4M a month ago to a desperate kid
[/quote]And then they rose to 6m and he probably sold it at that time :P[/quote]
I know that’s why I felt like shit 2 weeks later But it wasn’t that bad because I got it on the squeal so still 3.4M into my pockets ;D I still have 2 tho

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:16, topic:458082”]Why would anyone want to high alch ~$500?[/quote]Some people don’t think of RSGP as real life money. Maybe they do it to prove wealth, or they plan to quit. Not sure :o

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:6, topic:458082”]Depends how long you are willing to wait. It took 6 years for santas to reach 110m and they actually look nice.[/quote]Here’s the thing though… Santas were from an event, extremely accessible to basically everyone who played at that time. Probably when they first started they were just as much as afros… Fish Masks are accessible to everyone, but not as easily as the Santas were at the time, thus making it worth more to start out with. Another thing, is I’m going out on a limb here and saying that a lot of the players online at a time are bots, so I’m guessing that they have a lot of the fishmasks. After Botany Bay a lot of those masks will be gone, and since you won’t be able to get anymore after summer, bang, it would probably shoot up. Just the way I’m thinking it’s going to go… True they are pretty ugly, but here’s the thing, if they’re going to end up like phats or santas, people aren’t going to care, it’s a rare and they have one. Just the way I’m looking at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just so you know, the majority of people that eat them do so on purpose. Similar to people that alch party hats, etc. Usually it’s just for people that are quitting or want to show their wealth (usually recorded). I don’t think the warning will change that much

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The Wanderer:

It gives a warning before you eat it though. And theres tons of Easter eggs. Make more sense to invest in a cosmetic rare such as bween or Santa as you can show them off making them more wanted. Also rares can be alched. granted, any rare is a good long term investment, but I would warrant cosmetic ones will rise more.

I had no idea it now sends a warning when being eaten now. That’s pretty lame if you ask me, but then I guess the ones who’ve eaten Easter Eggs in the past thought THAT was pretty lame.

Read full topic

item.title: Fish Mask?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:458082”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=561007.msg4093708#msg4093708 date=1346636098]
I thought the same thing about afro’s… I have over 80 sitting in my bank. No value what so ever. I’ve tried selling them for 100gps a piece… Doesn’t cut it.
[/quote]You can still buy afro’s from a shop for 50gp though… that’s why they will never rise in price

To quote the wiki:

When afros were first introduced, many players thought they would be discontinued, making people buy bulk of each type. However, this will not happen, as Jagex has confirmed. [/quote]

Damn. I personally predict RS’s end to be too soon for those to ever get rare… Of course I probably wouldn’t be playing it at that time. So it doesn’t matter :\

Read full topic
